title: The Best Kasparov Combinations You've Never Seen
description:
#agadmator Garry Kasparov is definitely one of the best players in the history of chess. His games have been analyzed over and over in hundreds of books and thousands of articles and videos.

Then how can I be so sure that you somehow missed some of his brilliancies?

I don't want to reveal all my secrets yet, but the title of the article is absolutely correct and I am going to show you some beautiful Kasparov combinations that you've never seen before!
G. Serper

Read the full article here https://www.chess.com/article/view/kasparovs-combination-you-never-saw

Check out The Immortal Sacrifice Game :) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vztVylqnBSo&t=363s

Aleksei Surjadnji vs Sergey Kasparov
4th Open (2001), Tanta City EGY, rd 8, Apr-26 
Benko Gambit: Accepted. Fully Accepted Variation (A58)

1. d4 Nf6 2. c4 c5 3. d5 b5 4. cb5 a6 5. ba6 Ba6 6. Nc3 d6 7. Nf3 Nbd7 8. e4 Bf1 9. Kf1 g6 10. g3 Bg7 11. Kg2 O-O 12. Re1 Ra6 13. e5 Ng4 14. e6 fe6 15. de6 Bc3 16. bc3 Nde5 17. Bf4 Qa8 18. h3 Nh2 19. Re5 de5 20. Kh2 ef4 21. g4 Ra2 22. Ra2 Qa2 23. Qe1 Qd5 24. Kg2 Rf6
